code: import Constants from'expo-constants';import*as FileSystem from'expo-file-system';var bundledAssets=new Set(FileSystem.bundledAssets||[]);export function getEmbeddedAssetUri(hash,type){var assetName="asset_"+hash+(type?"."+type:'');if(__DEV__||Constants.appOwnership!=='standalone'||!bundledAssets.has(assetName)){return null;}return""+FileSystem.bundleDirectory+assetName;}
